#summary humanize(text)
#labels chapter,0.9.1

*Description*:

Returns readable text by capitalizing, converting camel casing to multiple words.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || Text to humanize ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#humanize("wheelsIsAFramework")#
-> Wheels Is A Framework


}}}

 * [capitalize capitalize()]
 * [excerpt excerpt()]
 * [highlight highlight()]
 * [pluralize pluralize()]
